summary: Client requested Jordan to run a test; QA executed the test and confirmed it passed with the output 'doing ok'. Other roles (Developer, PM, Architect) did not provide comments.

decisions.title: Test result accepted
decisions.details: QA confirmed the test output matches the expected value 'doing ok' and the test is considered passed.

sign_offs.what: Approved test result: output matches expected 'doing ok'

actions.task: Notify the client (Jordan) that the test passed and confirm next steps

backlog_deltas.title: Record and close test verification for output 'doing ok'

risks.risk: Developer, PM, and Architect did not respond to the request, which may delay follow-up actions or deployments.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with the non-responsive roles, assign clear owners and deadlines, and escalate to PM if no response within defined SLA.
